justification: Acknowledges B’s appetite for upside but mislabels players as rookies and ignores B’s urgent need for immediate production. Offering an Out Tier-5 TE and a Doubtful WR for B’s depth RB partly aligns with B’s injured buy-low tendency, yet Wright’s low ceiling and B’s win-now need undermine it. A’s ask (Tier-5 RB) doesn’t fit A’s urgent-win need given existing RB depth. Rationale is brief, lacks roster/role context, and misses B’s RB depth and TE situation nuances.
